targets.query: SELECT mean("memUsed") AS "used", mean("memBuffer") AS "buffered", mean("memCached") AS "cached", mean("memAvailReal") AS "free", mean("memTotalReal") AS "total physical" FROM "linux_mem" WHERE "device" =~ /^$device$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description:
•__RetransmitSegs__: The total number of segments retransmitted; that is, the number of TCP segments transmitted containing one or more previously transmitted octets. / min

•__ActiveOpen__: The number of times that TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-SENT state from the CLOSED state. / min.

•__Current Established__: he number of TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT. connections established  (in polling time)

•__InSegs__ : The total number of segments received, including those  received in error.  This count includes segments received on currently established connections. /min
panels.title: #TCP Connection Status / $time_interval

list.name: type
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM lan_metrics."1y".linux_cpu WITH KEY = "type"

list.name: device
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM lan_metrics."1y".linux_cpu WITH KEY = "device"
